column4: hey I'm trying to bring a computer running ubuntu 7.10 up to date. When I try to update the repos it's saying they don't exist anymore. what's the easiest way to get this thing current? Do I need to reformat?
but as matrixblue says, you should back up your home dir first
apt-get dist-upgrade just tried to get the one package it knows is out of date - I don't think it knows to get the updated repos
